div.p: Since Hippo 12, there is an Enterprise-level follow-up of this plugin, called the URL Rewriter Enterprise Add-on. It is a copy of this plugin, with some alterations, and it will be maintained and supported by BloomReach.
Please refer to URL Rewriter documentation on onehippo.org.

subsection.name: What is URL Rewriter?
subsection.p: URL Rewriter is a servlet filter that is an extension of Paul Tuckey's UrlRewriteFilter, but instead of a packaged xml file the filter is fed with data from CMS documents. So dynamically manageable instead of statically!

Since version 2.1.0, the plugin uses a Hippo fork of Paul Tuckey's UrlRewriteFilter which is at github.com/onehippo/urlrewritefilter
The original is at github.com/paultuckey/urlrewritefilter with documentation at www.tuckey.org/urlrewrite.

subsection.name: Code base on GitHub
subsection.p: The code of this project is on GitHub at https://github.com/bloomreach-forge/url-rewriter/.

subsection.name: Features
subsection.p: The URL Rewriter supports the following options:

ul.li: forward - Requests matching the "conditions" for this "rule", and the URL in the "from" element will be internally forwarded to the URL specified in the "to" element.
redirect - Requests matching the "conditions" and the "from" for this rule will be HTTP redirected
proxy - The request will be proxied to the full url specified.

subsection.p: See more at using the URL rewriter

subsection.name: Project status
subsection.p:
The 1.01.xx versions are not to be used due to incompatibility with 1.02.xx and higher
